title: Sort entries by newest date first

requirements.summary: Ensure the EntriesTable component displays entries in the order received from the backend without additional sorting
acceptanceCriteria: The EntriesTable renders entries in the exact order provided by the getEntries query
No client-side sorting is applied that would change the backend-provided order
The newest entry appears at the top of the table

file_operations.description: Review and verify that the component renders entries in the order received from the backend without applying any client-side sorting logic. Ensure the entries array is displayed in its original order from the getEntries or getEntriesByPerson queries.

Review the usage of entries data fetched from useGetEntries or useGetEntriesByPerson hooks. Verify that no sorting operations are applied to the entries array before passing it to EntriesTable. Ensure the component preserves the backend-provided order.

Review the usage of entries data in the admin interface. Verify that no sorting operations are applied to the entries array before displaying it. Ensure entries are shown in the order received from the backend.
